title: The US OPEN: Early Preview
body_text:
The U.S. Open is fast approaching its July 2 date and the anticipation continues to grow with each passing 24-hour span.
The main attraction of this rare holiday treat is some 11 years in the making between the two youngest brothers of the most recognized family in ECD history: Kevin Adams vs. Tom Adams. Here are some of the goods that each legendary figure has produced.
